title: PBE ACCOUNT
body: Ive still being waiting, its been 2-3 years now since I sent in a request for the PBE and whenever I have a little hope of maybe I'll have the account, I just go on to the page of the depressing heimerdinger and makes me so mad. Why does it take so long? I know people who applied and then got accepted a month later, I'm gold 5, never been banned for toxicity, and just don't understand why I have not been accepted. I posted about this almost a year ago as well

replies.body: I don't have any details on how applications are selected beyond what's in our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  We aren't able to expedite or force applications, but I wish you the best of luck!
maybe because you have xXXx in your name
